content: this crochet shell hat pattern is perfect for spring or fall the shell lace is made with a 2-row repeat that gradually decreases without the bulky bumpy fabric at the top >this pattern is available for free on my website here 1 if you prefer a pdf is also available for purchase this pattern is from a matching set the easy shell scarf 2 is also available 1 https //makeitcrochet com/crochet-shell-stitch-hat-pattern/ 2 https //makeitcrochet com/easy-crochet-lace-scarf-for-beginners/
